mapper.sql: ID, nodeName, afterNodeName, CREATETIME, parentNodeId, frontUrl, afterUrl, order_1, DESC1, DESC2, DESC3, DESC4
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(m.afterNodeName) FROM trwuliu_mainmenu m right join trwuliu_Role_Menu rm on m.id =rm.MENUID_R WHERE m.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR m.parentNodeId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from trwuliu_mainmenu where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR parentNodeId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update trwuliu_mainmenu
nodeName = #{nodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
afterNodeName = #{afternodename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentNodeId = #{parentnodeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
